text: ya 'ayuha alnaas 'iina waed allah balbeth walthwab waleiqab haqa thabt, fala tkhdennakm alhayat aldunya bshhwatha wmtalbha, wala ykhdennakm biallah alshytan. 'iina alshaytan libani adam edw, fatakhidhuh edwwana wala ttyewh, 'iinama yadeu atbaeh 'iilaa aldlal; liakunuu min 'ashab alnaar almwqdt
